comments.body: this will not create a loop between createBulkheadConfig() and buildConfigFromBaseConfig() ? as inside buildConfigFromBaseConfig()  u call createBulkheadConfig() and inside createBulkheadConfig() u can  buildConfigFromBaseConfig() if there is base configuration ?

Yes. There is a loop between `buildConfigFromBaseConfig()`and `createBulkheadConfig()`. 
Everytime we build BulkheadConfig, Need to check if there is `baseConfig`.
Then when it will stop that loop of checks ?
If there is no base config in instance properties, it will stop.
